S-sorry...!\""},{"lineNumber":28320,"originalJapaneseLine":"アールコートはクリームに肩を押されて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Arcourt was pushed on the shoulder by Cream,"},{"lineNumber":28321,"originalJapaneseLine":"仕事へと戻っていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and returned to his work."},{"lineNumber":28322,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あいっかわらず、修羅場全開だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...As always, it's full chaos here.\""},{"lineNumber":28323,"originalJapaneseLine":"辟易しながら、ランスは卓に置かれたメモを","translatedEnglishLine":"Exasperated, Rance picked up the memo placed on the table."},{"lineNumber":28324,"originalJapaneseLine":"手に取った。","translatedEnglishLine":"He took it in his hand."},{"lineNumber":28325,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お。今の戦況ってところか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh. So this is the current battle situation...\""},{"lineNumber":28326,"originalJapaneseLine":"見ているうちに、ランスの表情が渋くなる。","translatedEnglishLine":"As he looked it over, Rance's expression grew serious."},{"lineNumber":28327,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………足りんな。兵士が足りん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".........It's not enough. We don't have enough soldiers.\""},{"lineNumber":28328,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ですが……ほぼ限界です。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... we are nearly at our limit."},{"lineNumber":28329,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これ以上増やすのは、難しいですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Increasing beyond this is difficult.\""},{"lineNumber":28330,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、ウルザちゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Urza.\""},{"lineNumber":28331,"originalJapaneseLine":"「各国とも、混乱の中で動員できるだけの兵は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In every country, amidst the chaos, they are mobilizing all available soldiers."},{"lineNumber":28332,"originalJapaneseLine":"　動員しています。正規軍だけでなく、予備役も」","translatedEnglishLine":"Not just the regular army, but also the reserves.\""},{"lineNumber":28333,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、リーザスとかは人が多いぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But places like Leesas have a lot of people."},{"lineNumber":28334,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もうちょっといけるんじゃないのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Surely they can send more, can't they?\""},{"lineNumber":28335,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいえ、その表は前線で直接戦う兵士の数です。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, that chart shows the number of soldiers fighting directly on the frontline."},{"lineNumber":28336,"originalJapaneseLine":"　実際には、補給や流通、後方支援などで","translatedEnglishLine":"In reality, many more people are involved in supply, logistics, and rear support."},{"lineNumber":28337,"originalJapaneseLine":"　関わっている人は大勢います」","translatedEnglishLine":"There are a great number involved in these.\""},{"lineNumber":28338,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔軍と戦うには、こうした支援は不可欠です。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To fight the demon army, this kind of support is indispensable."},{"lineNumber":28339,"originalJapaneseLine":"　およそ五倍ほどの後方要員が、こうして……」","translatedEnglishLine":"About five times as many rear personnel are involved like this...\""},{"lineNumber":28340,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬう、めんどくさい話はパスだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, skip the complicated stuff."},{"lineNumber":28341,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今戦う兵士が少ないのが問題だろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"The problem is that there are too few soldiers currently fighting.\""},{"lineNumber":28342,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最大限に増員を掛けつつ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We are increasing manpower to the maximum,"},{"lineNumber":28343,"originalJapaneseLine":"　限られた数でやるしかないというのが現状ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"but the reality is we have to manage with limited numbers.\""},{"lineNumber":28344,"originalJapaneseLine":"「増員だと？　これ見る限りじゃ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Increasing manpower? From what I see here,"},{"lineNumber":28345,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どんどん減ってるではないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"the numbers are dropping rapidly.\""},{"lineNumber":28346,"originalJapaneseLine":"「増える以上の速度で減ってるんです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They’re decreasing faster than they can increase.\""},{"lineNumber":28347,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこで、ウルザは言葉を切った。","translatedEnglishLine":"At that, Urza stopped speaking."},{"lineNumber":28348,"originalJapaneseLine":"再び出した声は、周囲に届かない、低いものだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"When she spoke again, her voice was low and barely audible around her."},{"lineNumber":28349,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このままでは、人類は滅びます。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At this rate, humanity will perish."},{"lineNumber":28350,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスさんが魔人を倒すより、早く……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even before Rance can defeat the demons...\""},{"lineNumber":28351,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...........\""},{"lineNumber":28352,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ですが現実問題としては、難しいですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But as a practical matter, it's difficult."},{"lineNumber":28353,"originalJapaneseLine":"　作戦立案と効率化で対処するしかありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"The only choice is to manage through strategy planning and efficiency.\""},{"lineNumber":28354,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んん…………いや、よし。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... No, alright."},{"lineNumber":28355,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ならば俺様がなんとかしてやろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then I'll do something about it.\""},{"lineNumber":28356,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は……と言いますと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh... what do you mean?\""},{"lineNumber":28357,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺様が一声掛ければ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If I just say the word,"},{"lineNumber":28358,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだ戦ってないボンクラどもをかき集めて","translatedEnglishLine":"I can gather up all the clueless fools who haven't fought yet,"},{"lineNumber":28359,"originalJapaneseLine":"　兵士に仕立て上げるなど容易い事！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and easily turn them into soldiers!\""},{"lineNumber":28360,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、でも…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, but...\""},{"lineNumber":28361,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーし、どこに向かうかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright then, where should I head to?"},{"lineNumber":28362,"originalJapaneseLine":"　特に少ない所がいいか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Somewhere that especially lacks troops...\""},{"lineNumber":28363,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス城――――","translatedEnglishLine":"Leesas Castle――――"},{"lineNumber":28364,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃーーーーっ！　ダーーリーン！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaa—! Darling!"},{"lineNumber":28365,"originalJapaneseLine":"　来てくれたの！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You came for me!?\""},{"lineNumber":28366,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう。ちょっと用があってな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah. Got some business to attend to.\""},{"lineNumber":28367,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ご用事？　なになに？　楽しい事？　えっちな事？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Business? What is it? Something fun? Something naughty?"},{"lineNumber":28368,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ベッドでお話しする？　うん、そうしよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wanna talk in bed? Yeah, let's do that!\""},{"lineNumber":28369,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、ちょっと待たんか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hold on a minute.\""},{"lineNumber":28370,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「コロンズの状況に関する報告って来てます！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Have we received any reports on the situation in Kolons!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっち、来てるよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, they're coming in here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに目を通してくれ、対策会議するぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Skim through them immediately, we'll hold a strategy meeting!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「プリティリアの輸送計画、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The transport plan for Prettilia,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 受け入れ態勢はどうなってんです！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how is the reception setup going!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、お、おじ様……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, O-uncle...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほら、アールコートさん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Mr. Arcourt.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの案件、来てますから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The matters concerning Leesas have come in."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、は、はいっ……す、すみません……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes... S-sorry...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アールコートはクリームに肩を押されて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arcourt was pushed on the shoulder by Cream,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕事へと戻っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and returned to his work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あいっかわらず、修羅場全開だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...As always, it's full chaos here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辟易しながら、ランスは卓に置かれたメモを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Exasperated, Rance picked up the memo placed on the table.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手に取った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He took it in his hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お。今の戦況ってところか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh. So this is the current battle situation..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見ているうちに、ランスの表情が渋くなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As he looked it over, Rance's expression grew serious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「………………足りんな。兵士が足りん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ".........It's not enough. We don't have enough soldiers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですが……ほぼ限界です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... we are nearly at our limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ以上増やすのは、難しいですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Increasing beyond this is difficult."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、ウルザちゃん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Urza."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「各国とも、混乱の中で動員できるだけの兵は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In every country, amidst the chaos, they are mobilizing all available soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動員しています。正規軍だけでなく、予備役も」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not just the regular army, but also the reserves."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、リーザスとかは人が多いぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But places like Leesas have a lot of people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうちょっといけるんじゃないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surely they can send more, can't they?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいえ、その表は前線で直接戦う兵士の数です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, that chart shows the number of soldiers fighting directly on the frontline.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実際には、補給や流通、後方支援などで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In reality, many more people are involved in supply, logistics, and rear support.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 関わっている人は大勢います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are a great number involved in these."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍と戦うには、こうした支援は不可欠です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To fight the demon army, this kind of support is indispensable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: およそ五倍ほどの後方要員が、こうして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About five times as many rear personnel are involved like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬう、めんどくさい話はパスだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, skip the complicated stuff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今戦う兵士が少ないのが問題だろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The problem is that there are too few soldiers currently fighting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最大限に増員を掛けつつ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We are increasing manpower to the maximum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 限られた数でやるしかないというのが現状ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the reality is we have to manage with limited numbers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「増員だと？　これ見る限りじゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Increasing manpower? From what I see here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんどん減ってるではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the numbers are dropping rapidly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「増える以上の速度で減ってるんです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They’re decreasing faster than they can increase."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで、ウルザは言葉を切った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that, Urza stopped speaking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再び出した声は、周囲に届かない、低いものだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When she spoke again, her voice was low and barely audible around her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このままでは、人類は滅びます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At this rate, humanity will perish.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさんが魔人を倒すより、早く……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even before Rance can defeat the demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですが現実問題としては、難しいですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But as a practical matter, it's difficult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦立案と効率化で対処するしかありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only choice is to manage through strategy planning and efficiency."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んん…………いや、よし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... No, alright.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならば俺様がなんとかしてやろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I'll do something about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は……と言いますと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh... what do you mean?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様が一声掛ければ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I just say the word,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ戦ってないボンクラどもをかき集めて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can gather up all the clueless fools who haven't fought yet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士に仕立て上げるなど容易い事！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and easily turn them into soldiers!"
"Eh, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、どこに向かうかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright then, where should I head to?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に少ない所がいいか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somewhere that especially lacks troops..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leesas Castle――――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃーーーーっ！　ダーーリーン！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa—! Darling!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 来てくれたの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You came for me!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう。ちょっと用があってな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. Got some business to attend to."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご用事？　なになに？　楽しい事？　えっちな事？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Business? What is it? Something fun? Something naughty?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドでお話しする？　うん、そうしよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wanna talk in bed? Yeah, let's do that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、ちょっと待たんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hold on a minute."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Yeah, let's do that!\""},{"lineNumber":28369,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、ちょっと待たんか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hold on a minute.\""},{"lineNumber":28370,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「コロンズの状況に関する報告って来てます！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Have we received any reports on the situation in Kolons!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっち、来てるよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, they're coming in here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに目を通してくれ、対策会議するぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Skim through them immediately, we'll hold a strategy meeting!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「プリティリアの輸送計画、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The transport plan for Prettilia,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 受け入れ態勢はどうなってんです！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how is the reception setup going!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、お、おじ様……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, O-uncle...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほら、アールコートさん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Mr. Arcourt.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの案件、来てますから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The matters concerning Leesas have come in."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、は、はいっ……す、すみません……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes... S-sorry...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アールコートはクリームに肩を押されて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arcourt was pushed on the shoulder by Cream,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕事へと戻っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and returned to his work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あいっかわらず、修羅場全開だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...As always, it's full chaos here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辟易しながら、ランスは卓に置かれたメモを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Exasperated, Rance picked up the memo placed on the table.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手に取った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He took it in his hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お。今の戦況ってところか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh. So this is the current battle situation..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見ているうちに、ランスの表情が渋くなる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As he looked it over, Rance's expression grew serious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「………………足りんな。兵士が足りん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ".........It's not enough. We don't have enough soldiers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですが……ほぼ限界です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... we are nearly at our limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ以上増やすのは、難しいですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Increasing beyond this is difficult."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、ウルザちゃん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Urza."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「各国とも、混乱の中で動員できるだけの兵は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In every country, amidst the chaos, they are mobilizing all available soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動員しています。正規軍だけでなく、予備役も」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not just the regular army, but also the reserves."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、リーザスとかは人が多いぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But places like Leesas have a lot of people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうちょっといけるんじゃないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surely they can send more, can't they?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいえ、その表は前線で直接戦う兵士の数です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, that chart shows the number of soldiers fighting directly on the frontline.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実際には、補給や流通、後方支援などで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In reality, many more people are involved in supply, logistics, and rear support.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 関わっている人は大勢います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are a great number involved in these."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍と戦うには、こうした支援は不可欠です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To fight the demon army, this kind of support is indispensable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: およそ五倍ほどの後方要員が、こうして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About five times as many rear personnel are involved like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬう、めんどくさい話はパスだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, skip the complicated stuff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今戦う兵士が少ないのが問題だろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The problem is that there are too few soldiers currently fighting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最大限に増員を掛けつつ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We are increasing manpower to the maximum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 限られた数でやるしかないというのが現状ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the reality is we have to manage with limited numbers."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「増員だと？　これ見る限りじゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Increasing manpower? From what I see here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんどん減ってるではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the numbers are dropping rapidly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「増える以上の速度で減ってるんです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They’re decreasing faster than they can increase."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで、ウルザは言葉を切った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that, Urza stopped speaking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再び出した声は、周囲に届かない、低いものだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When she spoke again, her voice was low and barely audible around her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このままでは、人類は滅びます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At this rate, humanity will perish.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさんが魔人を倒すより、早く……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even before Rance can defeat the demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ですが現実問題としては、難しいですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But as a practical matter, it's difficult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦立案と効率化で対処するしかありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only choice is to manage through strategy planning and efficiency."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んん…………いや、よし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... No, alright.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならば俺様がなんとかしてやろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I'll do something about it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は……と言いますと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh... what do you mean?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様が一声掛ければ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I just say the word,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ戦ってないボンクラどもをかき集めて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can gather up all the clueless fools who haven't fought yet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士に仕立て上げるなど容易い事！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and easily turn them into soldiers!"
"Eh, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、どこに向かうかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright then, where should I head to?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に少ない所がいいか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somewhere that especially lacks troops..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leesas Castle――――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃーーーーっ！　ダーーリーン！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa—! Darling!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 来てくれたの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You came for me!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう。ちょっと用があってな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. Got some business to attend to."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご用事？　なになに？　楽しい事？　えっちな事？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Business? What is it? Something fun? Something naughty?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドでお話しする？　うん、そうしよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wanna talk in bed? Yeah, let's do that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、ちょっと待たんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hold on a minute."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah."
